imdb.plot outline: In this series of three uplifting and searingly honest programmes, we delve into the heartache of first love, the intimacy of close friendship, the inspiration of young people overcoming the odds and the high-stakes drama of life outside the college.
imdb.title: The Unbreakables: Life and Love on Disability Campus
akas: The Unbreakables: Life and Love on Disability Campus (United Kingdom)
plot: In this series of three uplifting and searingly honest programmes, we delve into the heartache of first love, the intimacy of close friendship, the inspiration of young people overcoming the odds and the high-stakes drama of life outside the college.::Minnow Films
